a1: Who is the best national team in the world?
q2: I guess that depends on who won the last world cup. It's always changing. Speaking of world cup, did they settle where the next one is going to be yet?
a2: I'm pretty sure it's Qatar in 2022
q3: Do you like that the next World Cup will be held in winter because of the heat in the middle east?
a3: Mind the gap! Premier League will be hit by enforced winter break
a4: i think the next world cup there will betters team than the past world cup
q5: I don't expect much form it.
a5: I'm just happy it won't be in Venezuela for a while. The sound of vuvuzelas is seared into my mind.
